languages.text: "Лучше умереть. Лучше просто умереть, чем жить так!"
"I'd be better off dead. I'd rather just die than live like this!"
languages.original_text: "Лучше умереть. Лучше просто умереть, чем жить так!"

traits.locale_text: "It's better to die. I'd rather just die than live like this!"
"It's better to die. I'd rather just die than live like this!"
"I'd better die. I'd rather just die than live like this!"
"I'd better die. I'd rather just die than live like this!"
"I'd be better off dead. I'd rather just die than live like this!"
"I'd be better off dead. I'd rather just die than live like this!"

languages.text: 「こんなふうに生きるくらいなら。死んだ方がマシだ！」
languages.original_text: "I'd be better off dead. I'd rather just die than live like this!"

traits.locale_text: 「こんなふうに生きるくらいなら。死んだ方がマシだ！」

languages.text: “我还不如死了呢。我宁可去死，也不想再这么活着了！”
languages.original_text: "I'd be better off dead. I'd rather just die than live like this!"

traits.locale_text: “我还是死吧。我宁可去死，也不想再这么活着了！”

languages.text: «Estaría mejor muerto. Prefiero morir que vivir así».
languages.original_text: "I'd be better off dead. I'd rather just die than live like this!"

traits.locale_text: «Mejor me muero. Prefiero morir que vivir así».

languages.text: "Ich wäre tot besser dran. Ich sterbe lieber, als so zu leben!"
languages.original_text: "I'd be better off dead. I'd rather just die than live like this!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich sollte einfach sterben. Ich sterbe lieber, als so zu sterben!"

languages.text: « Je préfère mourir plutôt que de vivre comme ça ! »
languages.original_text: "I'd be better off dead. I'd rather just die than live like this!"

traits.locale_text: « Je préfère mourir plutôt que de vivre comme ça ! »

languages.text: "Ölsem daha iyi. Böyle yaşamaktansa ölmeyi yeğlerim!"
languages.original_text: "I'd be better off dead. I'd rather just die than live like this!"

traits.locale_text: "Ölsem daha iyi. Böyle yaşamaktansa ölmeyi yeğlerim!"
